original_text: When the woman came to Saul and saw that he was greatly shaken, she said, “Look, your servant has obeyed you. I took my life in my hands and did what you told me to do.
korean_text: 그 여인이 사울에게 이르러 그가 심히 고통 당함을 보고 그에게 이르되 여종이 왕의 말씀을 듣고 내 생명을 아끼지 아니하고 왕이 내게 이르신 말씀을 순종하였사오니

sentences.original_text: When the woman came to Saul
and saw that he was greatly shaken
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 크게 떨고 있는 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: Look, your servant has obeyed you
I took my life in my hands
and did what you told me to do
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 나에게 하라고 한 것을 행했습니다
